testcase.name: And I choose a book from the list

testcase.name: Then The book description will be loaded with price and an option to order

testcase.name: Scenario: Choose a product from random category
Given I have an existing account with an online bookshop
When I log into the website
And I search for a specific book
Then I will be able to select the book from the search results
And The book description will be loaded with price and an option to order
Scenario: Search for a product

testcase.classname: Scenario: Add a book to the basket
testcase.name: Given I have an existing account with an online bookshop

testcase.classname: Scenario: Add a book to the basket
testcase.name: When I log into the website

testcase.classname: Scenario: Add a book to the basket
testcase.name: And I search and load a specific book

testcase.classname: Scenario: Add a book to the basket
testcase.name: And I click on the Add to basket option

testcase.classname: Scenario: Add a book to the basket
testcase.name: Then The book will be added to the basket

testcase.classname: Scenario: Add a book to the basket
testcase.name: Scenario: Add a book to the basket
Given I have an existing account with an online bookshop
When I log into the website
And I add a book to the basket
And I load the added products
Then I will be able to increase the quantity
And I will be able to remove the products from the basket
Scenario: Edit the basket
Given I run a SOAP request using code 31460290
Then I verify the location Viersen
And the bank name is Volksbank Viersen
| 31460290 | Viersen | Volksbank Viersen |
Given I run a SOAP request using code 31061108
Then I verify the location Willich
And the bank name is Volksbank Willich
| 31061108 | Willich | Volksbank Willich |
Given I run a SOAP request using code 31261282
Then I verify the location Erkelenz
And the bank name is Volksbank Erkelenz-Hückelhoven-Wegberg
| 31261282 | Erkelenz | Volksbank Erkelenz-Hückelhoven-Wegberg |
Given I run a SOAP request using code 34270094
Then I verify the location Solingen
And the bank name is Deutsche Bank
| 34270094 | Solingen | Deutsche Bank |
